title: European Leaders Again Reject Russia’s Demand to Be Paid in Rubles For Gas - The New York Times
content:
1. European Leaders Again Reject Russia’s Demand to Be Paid in Rubles For Gas  The New York Times
  2. Putin threatens to stop supplies of Russian gas if not paid in roubles - BBC News  BBC News
  3. Russia raises stakes in energy standoff by insisting on rubles for gas  CNN
  4. UK is not looking to pay for Russian gas in roubles -PM's spokesman  Reuters UK
  5. Putin accused of blackmail over gas supplies to Europe - BBC News  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Existing contracts that allow for payments in Western currencies must be upheld, European leaders insist, while economists contemplate Vladimir Putin’s motives.
